casebody.data:
MANUEL BROTHERS, INC., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee. No. 03-5067. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. April 9, 2004. *345Mark L. McAlpine, Principal Attorney, Steven A. Wright, of Counsel, McAlpine & McAlpine, Auburn Hills, MI, for Plaintiff-Appellant. Jane W. Vanneman, Principal Attorney, Monica J. Palko, of Counsel, Department of Justice, Washington, DC, for Defendant-Appellee.

Before LOURIE, Circuit Judge, FRIEDMAN, Senior Circuit Judge, and CLEVENGER, Circuit Judge.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
